title: Beautiful, Spacious, Sunny 2br+, yard space, fire place ($2,850)
map_address: Mount Vernon St. near Bancroft Ave
posting_body: ['Beautiful, spacious, sunny 2 bedroom+, 1 bathroom, 2nd floor apartment with 3 car off street parking (2 driveway and 1 garage space, which is good for parking and/or storage) located on a quiet street within a 3 minute walk to the commuter rail, downtown Reading and a less than 5 minute drive to Rt. 95 & Rt. 93.', 'Local popular restaurants, stores/shopping, new library, banks, post office & schools are only a short walk away.', 'Description:', '- 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, large kitchen, living room, dining room, sunroom and small covered/screened in porch', '- 1,344 sq.', 'ft., 2nd floor apartment', '- Hardwood floors throughout', '- Large kitchen with walk-in pantry', '- Dining room with built-in china cabinet', '- Spacious sunroom (great for office space, playroom, etc.)', '- Large living room with working brick fireplace', '-Bonus small three season seating porch overlooking backyard', '- Laundry in building and storage space in basement', '- 3 off street parking spaces.', '2 driveway spaces and 1 detached garage space (garage space or great for parking, or more storage)', '- Large, shared yard', '- Gas heat', '- Comcast or Verizon available', '- Dog permitted with permission of owner']
